story:
The Concept

The zompocalypse has come and gone, over a year ago in fact. The world erupted into chaos overnight. Governments fell, armies were destroyed and the world as you knew it ended, but somehow you survived. The last dying gasp of an international medical task force was to release an antidote for the zombie virus into the atmosphere just before they were finally overrun. There will be no new zombies, but the ones that are around are still after your flesh. You're safer than you used to be, not safe, but safer.

You heard about a sanctuary set up to try and work to restore society, share survival skills and finally settle down to build a life and a community safe from the zombies. In a burst of hope you decided to join them...

The Festival

A highly narrative driven immersive festival, Rebuild invites survivors into a sanctuary where they can party at the end of the world whilst working together to design a new one. We believe festivals offer a unique opportunity for participants to create their own world for a weekend and we want our festival goers to imagine something new and beautiful.

This festival aims to take people outside their normal day to day narrative and challenge them to explore alternatives, learn new skills to help make them more self reliant, engage with the environment and, of course, have a damn good weekend. We'll be hosting permaculture workshops, discussions on society and culture, heritage craft skill sessions, foraging walks and much more. It's not a festival about the end of the world, it's a festival about the world we could build. We want people to leave the festival with something positive to take back with them and a renewed sense of connection with the natural world.

Great, but what’s actually going to be there?

Well, you’re in for a treat with the following stages and festival areas:

Main Stage - Big bands and funky tunes – headline announcements coming early 2017 – stay tuned survivors!

Tenty McTentface - (no, not really, we’ll be running a competition in January where you can name this venue and the winner will receive two tickets – keep an eye on our social media pages for info) Keep on dancin’ with ska, afrobeat, funk and more; live music and DJs to take you into the night.

Traveller’s Rest - Cosy up in our real ale bar with blues and folk musicians strumming you through the day and getting into a right old knees up as the sun goes down. You’ll definitely be jumping on Saturday night as we welcome the Scottish alt.blues troubadour Dave Arcari!

"Dave plays like he got his skin turned inside out and pretty soon my skin was inside out too listening and it was all good. That boy bleeds for you – he a real down deep player and a soul man..." SEASICK STEVE

The Sanctuary - One foot forward in the apocalypse – reggae, jungle, bassweight and more - hosted by the legendary Roots Sheffield crew and powered by DEM audio! 

The Clearing - Venture into the deepest, darkest woods in the camp and you’ll find this raver’s haven; a little bit cyberpunk a little bit dystopia, all tuneage. Excited to announce this stage will be hosted by the incredible OffMeNut Records and LSS!

Commons Fair - Explore the workshops and skills sessions to learn everything you need to survive and build a new world, knowledge is power and here, we share it.

The Art House - Lost souls gather for a collective outpouring of spoken word, theatre, comedy and expression to mourn the world lost and explore the new.

We’ll be adding more line up announcements as the month goes on – expect immersive theatre, mind expanding speakers and awe inspiring cinema!

The Challenge

So you might be thinking – well festivals are really expensive, this isn’t a campaign for very much and shouldn’t you get all your cash from tickets anyway? The truth is that festival funding is complicated. A lot comes from ticket sales but also there are concession sales, bar licenses, merchandise, sponsorship and investments, to name a few.

We want to avoid corporate sponsorship as far as possible and we want to give ourselves the best chance of success that we can. One of the things that often scuppers large events is having to pay deposits for artists and suppliers before you can access revenue from ticket sales or concessions. We already have an initial investment to the project and we want your help to top it up and help us avoid this fate. We’re looking for people to jump on board with the concept and kickstart this event for everyone. That’s why we have the early adopters only ticket price as one of our perks – nowhere other than this funding campaign will you get a ticket for the festival so cheap. This is to say thank you for believing in Rebuild!

Do you know what you’re doing?

Excellent question. We’ve been dreaming of running our own festival for years. Myself, Sara Hill, and Olly Galvin and Adam Went have worked in the industry for a long time – between us we have over 30 years experience. We are passionate about outdoor events as well as creating positive social change and the opportunity that festivals provide for this. Bringing these things together is what we’ve been working towards for all these years. We have the knowledge, experience and contacts to make this spectacular. We just need your help to get it going.

What if I don’t have any money?

If you can’t contribute to the campaign, you can still help us reach our target by using the Indiegogo share tools and spreading the word. You can also follow our social media accounts and spread the word about the event and line up announcements as we approach July.

If you are interested in helping out at the festival then please contact us on hello@rebuildfestival.com – we’re always looking for like minded builders, grafters, artists, stewards and more to join the crew.

story:
JEDER Musiker träumt von seinem eigenen Album. WARUM also nicht mitträumen??

So startete ich im Dezember 2015 einen Aufruf als DJ, in dem ich Sänger und Sängerinnen für mein Album suchte. Nach drei Castings und knapp 450 Bewerber aus ganz Süddeutschland fiel die Wahl auf zwölf, mehr als talentierte, Musiker. 

Die Aufteilung in der Albumproduktion ist klar verteilt.

Ich und mein Musikerkkollege Martin kümmern sich um die Produktion der Beats. Diese bestehen aus elektronisch minimaoistischen Grundbeats, die dann durch Drum and Bass sowie Dubstep Elemente verfeinert werden. Die dazu komponierten Melodien werden von Lireinstrumenten direkt eingespielt.

Die Sänger schreiben ihren eigenen und damit persönlichen Text dazu.  

Jeder Beat ist auch auf den eigenen Sänger ausgerichtet, wodurch jeder Song niemals dem anderen gleicht. Da die Sänger alle aus verschiedenen Musikgenres kommen (Rock, Rock'n'Roll, Pop, Rap, Soul, Klassik etc.) lässt es das Album zu einem Musikfeuerwerk aus vielen verschiedenen Genren werden und hebt sich somit vom Mainstream-Charakter mehr als ab.

Neben den Künstlern arbeitet bereits meine Grafikdesignerin Nina Schleifer am Albumcover und mein Booker Marcel Ott an der geplanten Promotion Tour inkl. 4 Live-Konzerten.

Leider sind die Labels heutzutage nicht mehr richtig in der Lage musikalische Projekte, außerhalb des Mainstreams, zu unterstützen.

Mit eurer Unterstützung werdet ihr ein Teil unserer #teamtalent-Familie, sorgt dafür wieder mehr Vielfalt in die Musikbranche zu bringen und damit auch unseren Traum Wirklichkeit werden zu lassen.

story:
Short Summary

Clazz offers a completely unique music festival experience for attendees and students that will be life changing. Tuition includes: transportation to and from Rome Airport, room and board for 11 days, meals, 4 lessons, 4 group coachings, chamber orchestra experience, masterclasses, presentations, many concerts, opportunities to perform, a trip to Siena, and a summer you will never forget. Prices are as low as they can be while still covering our operational costs: $1,700 for a double room or $1,900 for a single room. 

Because Clazz is new, we don't have a lot of overhead and or extra support to be able to grant as much as we would like in scholarship yet. That's where your help comes in huge support!!

What We Need & What You Get

We are trying to raise $25,000 over the next month. 100% of the money raised from this fund drive will go to support talented students coming to Clazz International Music Festival 2017. If we reach our goal, that is equivalent to fifty $500 scholarships. We are hoping to also be able to grant a handful of full scholarships with this money and to invest a small amount for scholarship funds for future years of Clazz.

The Impact

The impact this will have on students is life changing. Also, going hand-in-hand, this will directly impact the success of Clazz this summer and for the future to come!

Risks & Challenges

If we aren't able to raise a significant amount of money, we may not be able to get as many students as we would like at Clazz this summer, and this would make it difficult to fill out our ensembles and programs.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help spread the word about Clazz International Music Festival!

Visit our website to find out more information and apply now:
http://www.clazzmusicfestival.com/

story:
Greetings, thank you so much for visiting my Indiegogo Campaign!
My name is Eluv, I am a Healing Music Artist, Intuitive Channeler, DJ & Radio Show Host.

Why sound healing?

  • For me, music and sound healing is an act of love.

  • I love working with sound as a healing modality.

  • I love to share the joy I experience.

  • I am passionate about sound healing. It has transformed my life. It has carried me on its wings through difficult times. It has helped me soar to new heights when I take flight.

  • It has helped me assist others. Countless times I've witnessed sound healing positively transform the lives of others. (always exciting and super inspiring to be a part of)

    How do I create healing sound?

  • I combine my vocals with a tapestry of pure tones of the Crystal Singing Bowls, lush harp strings, and other beautiful sounds.

  • The ethereal pure tones generated by the Crystal Singing Bowls are some of the purest and most powerful healing tones in existence.

  • I have an open-hearted intuitive approach to music/sound healing.

  • Objective: To create music to help uplift and awaken inner peace, joy, well-being, heart opening and deep relaxation in others. 

    Why Alchemy bowls?

  • Each bowl has its own unique sound based on its composition.

  • In Alchemy bowls, Quartz Crystal is combined with precious gems, metals, minerals, and other elements in a magical process of true alchemy. 

  • In using the Alchemy bowls multiple healing modalities are accessed: Sound Therapy, Color Therapy, Gemstone Therapy, Mineral Therapy & Crystal Therapy and more. 

  • They are lighter than the type I currently have.

    The Magnitude of your support...

  • Your support will help cover costs of the trip, a set of alchemy bowls and equipment.

  • Your support will help make it possible for me to share this unique form of sound healing with music therapists from many different countries, some of whom have never experienced the Crystal Singing Bowls or Angel Harps.

  • Inspiring others to incorporate Crystal Singing Bowls into their own practice, opening new opportunities to help others to learn this modality...The possibilities are infinite!

    How fundraising works on this platform...

  • Fundraising costs run between 8%-10% of total earned.

  • eg: for the $8000 goal of this campaign, between $640-$800 will go to fees.

  • Remaining actual funds raised =$7360-$7200

  • Actual Amount Needed $12,569 (see below)

 

For You...

  • In choosing to support, huge, abundant thanks to you. Your support is amazing and so greatly appreciated. It is such a joyful expression and I am grateful. The ripple effect of your giving is infinite.
  • All the gifts for you (Perks) have been made and are done with infinite amounts of Love, blessings and the highest of intentions. 
  • (Album Descriptions are at very bottom of page)

 

What Is Needed to make it all happen...

Expenses:

  • Round Trip Travel to Japan $1211 (at time of writing this)

  • Additional Baggage fees $200

  • Accommodation - Hotel 7 days $700 plus taxes

  • Transportation - (each way $250 for car airport to hotel-1 hour away) = $500 plus tips.

  • Cab daily to & from convention $100

  • Incidentals & Food $ 500-$600

  • Congress Fees $370

  • Federation of Music Therapy Fees $90

  • Set of 8 Alchemy Crystal Singing Bowls.  $7,511-$10,000 (depending on what bowls are available at the time)

  • Audio Equipment - $799.00  (plus shipping $25)

  • Hardshell Harp travel case $99 (+35 shipping)

  • Crystal Bowl Hard Cases 2 x $250 each =$500 (+ $60 shipping)

    Budget Total-$12,608 (based on lower numbers)   ($15,197 based on higher numbers)

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please help Pollinate this campaign by Posting it:)

    Help get the buzzz out about the campaign via Facebook, Twitter, email, blog, word of mouth or any other creative inspirations or outlets you may have. All is greatly appreciated.

    Sharing is easy, copy and paste either link
     

  • http://igg.me/at/eluvjapan/3400248

  • OR

  • http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/eluv-taking-sound-healing-to-japan-music/x/3400248#/


    Extending my deepest gratitude for your love and support.
    May you be blessed, may you experience inner peace, love
    and joy, may your path be clear and your dreams manifest.

    Gratitude, Peace, Love & Light,
    Eluv

 

 

 

Eluv's Music & Guided Meditation Albums:

Click to Listen to my music

"Octaves of Light" with Hemi-Sync® Music by Eluv

International recording artist Eluv has created a unique blend of world music and sound based on her divine inspiration to help others. Combined with Hemi-Sync® frequencies to bring balance and harmony, this delicate and beautiful music also supports the benefits of energy and bodywork. Instruments featured: didgeridoo, tubular bells, crystal singing bowls (in the key of the heart chakra), Native American flute, Indian flute, keyboards, chimes, shenai, tabla, pipa, nature sounds, and Eluv's captivating voice as a celestial instrument on select tracks.

Chakra Meditation with Hemi-Sync® album by Eluv

Dolphin sounds and music combine to help align and balance each of the seven major chakras in this verbally guided Hemi-Sync® exercise, created and voiced by Eluv. Located along the central line of the body, chakras receive and transmit life-force energy to our physical, mental, emotional and spiritual bodies. When we experience unreleased emotions such as fear, anger or guilt, the energy flows less freely and can become blocked. The affirmations included here will help to optimize each chakra for an overall sense of well-being. Features two tracks; Track 1 is a 51-minute extended meditation to fully open and deepen the process; Track 2 is a 23-minute abridged version for a quick balance and alignment.

“New Beginning's” - Crystal Singing Bowls - Music by Eluv

This album features the sublime healing sounds of the Crystal Singing Bowls, Eluv's soothing vocals, lush string movements, along with the natural soundscape of gentle ocean waves filled with Dolphin energy recorded on Honeymoon Island (Florida Gulf Coast) while a pod of Dolphins played joyfully in the water.

“Letting Go” Meditation and Guided Visualization by Eluv

This is a simple yet powerful meditation for releasing and letting go of negative energy and things you no longer need or empower you.

Eluv's blissful voice guides you on a journey of inner healing to help you clear and release old fears, pains, negative thought patterns and re-harmonize your emotions. After listening to this CD you will feel lighter energetically, more relaxed and grounded. This CD is an excellent tool to help clear your body’s energy system. It will help to redirect and transform your mental focus into a positive uncluttered mind, leaving you with renewed strength.

“Creating New Beginnings” Meditation and Guided Visualization by Eluv

Eluv's soothing voice guides you on a transformational journey of new beginnings along with powerful affirmations. This CD features sound therapy with healing frequencies of crystal singing bowls and ocean waves recorded by Eluv. This CD is also encoded with healing frequencies and ancestral clearing to assist you in creating new beginnings. Ancestral Clearing assists in Releasing family patterns known or unknown that may be blocking you from moving forward and experiencing abundant wellness, joy and unlimited possibilities in your life.

“Surgery Assist” Meditation and Guided Visualization by Eluv

This meditation is essential listening for anyone going through a medical procedure.

This CD is designed to assist you both prior and post surgery or medical procedure. Helping you restore balance in your physical and emotional body, connecting you with a deeper sense of peace, and inner strength...Rejuvenating your mind body & spirit...Grounding and Relaxing you.

Eluv's soothing voice guides you on a journey of pre surgery preparation, pre and post surgery affirmations. This CD is a powerful tool to support your healing while preparing you for surgery, optimal healing and a swift recovery.

"11.11 Stress Relief" - Relaxation Meditation by Eluv

This is a short 11 minute-11 sec guided meditation for immediate stress relief, relaxation and re-alignment. Great to do on a regular basis (daily). A great way to begin, take a break in the middle or end the day with. Shift your energy fast with this guided meditation.

Hardshell Harp travel case $99 (+35 shipping)
Crystal Bowl Hard Cases 2 x $250 each =$500 (+ $60 shipping)Budget Total-$12,608 (based on lower numbers)   ($15,197 based on higher numbers)

 

Other Ways You Can Help



Please help Pollinate this campaign by Posting it:)
Help get the buzzz out about the campaign via Facebook, Twitter, email, blog, word of mouth or any other creative inspirations or outlets you may have. All is greatly appreciated.
Sharing is easy, copy and paste either link 

http://igg.me/at/eluvjapan/3400248
OR
http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/eluv-taking-sound-healing-to-japan-music/x/3400248#/Extending my deepest gratitude for your love and support. May you be blessed, may you experience inner peace, loveand joy, may your path be clear and your dreams manifest.Gratitude, Peace, Love & Light,Eluv

 
 
 
Eluv's Music & Guided Meditation Albums:
Click to Listen to my music
"Octaves of Light" with Hemi-Sync® Music by Eluv
International recording artist Eluv has created a unique blend of world music and sound based on her divine inspiration to help others. Combined with Hemi-Sync® frequencies to bring balance and harmony, this delicate and beautiful music also supports the benefits of energy and bodywork. Instruments featured: didgeridoo, tubular bells, crystal singing bowls (in the key of the heart chakra), Native American flute, Indian flute, keyboards, chimes, shenai, tabla, pipa, nature sounds, and Eluv's captivating voice as a celestial instrument on select tracks.
Chakra Meditation with Hemi-Sync® album by Eluv
Dolphin sounds and music combine to help align and balance each of the seven major chakras in this verbally guided Hemi-Sync® exercise, created and voiced by Eluv. Located along the central line of the body, chakras receive and transmit life-force energy to our physical, mental, emotional and spiritual bodies. When we experience unreleased emotions such as fear, anger or guilt, the energy flows less freely and can become blocked. The affirmations included here will help to optimize each chakra for an overall sense of well-being. Features two tracks; Track 1 is a 51-minute extended meditation to fully open and deepen the process; Track 2 is a 23-minute abridged version for a quick balance and alignment.
“New Beginning's” - Crystal Singing Bowls - Music by Eluv
This album features the sublime healing sounds of the Crystal Singing Bowls, Eluv's soothing vocals, lush string movements, along with the natural soundscape of gentle ocean waves filled with Dolphin energy recorded on Honeymoon Island (Florida Gulf Coast) while a pod of Dolphins played joyfully in the water.
“Letting Go” Meditation and Guided Visualization by Eluv
This is a simple yet powerful meditation for releasing and letting go of negative energy and things you no longer need or empower you.
Eluv's blissful voice guides you on a journey of inner healing to help you clear and release old fears, pains, negative thought patterns and re-harmonize your emotions. After listening to this CD you will feel lighter energetically, more relaxed and grounded. This CD is an excellent tool to help clear your body’s energy system. It will help to redirect and transform your mental focus into a positive uncluttered mind, leaving you with renewed strength.
“Creating New Beginnings” Meditation and Guided Visualization by Eluv
Eluv's soothing voice guides you on a transformational journey of new beginnings along with powerful affirmations. This CD features sound therapy with healing frequencies of crystal singing bowls and ocean waves recorded by Eluv. This CD is also encoded with healing frequencies and ancestral clearing to assist you in creating new beginnings. Ancestral Clearing assists in Releasing family patterns known or unknown that may be blocking you from moving forward and experiencing abundant wellness, joy and unlimited possibilities in your life.
“Surgery Assist” Meditation and Guided Visualization by Eluv
This meditation is essential listening for anyone going through a medical procedure.
This CD is designed to assist you both prior and post surgery or medical procedure. Helping you restore balance in your physical and emotional body, connecting you with a deeper sense of peace, and inner strength...Rejuvenating your mind body & spirit...Grounding and Relaxing you.
Eluv's soothing voice guides you on a journey of pre surgery preparation, pre and post surgery affirmations. This CD is a powerful tool to support your healing while preparing you for surgery, optimal healing and a swift recovery.
"11.11 Stress Relief" - Relaxation Meditation by Eluv
This is a short 11 minute-11 sec guided meditation for immediate stress relief, relaxation and re-alignment. Great to do on a regular basis (daily). A great way to begin, take a break in the middle or end the day with. Shift your energy fast with this guided meditation.

story:
Following last year’s launch of the festival, these two veterans of the scene are joining forces to bring you an even more ambitious and unique event on board the legendary Ms Stubnitz. At this stage we need your help to give Primal Uproar an extra economic boost to make sure it happens at the highest possible standards. With your help, we will be able to bring you an event featuring a wide range of international artists to deliver memorable performances at this massive event. 

 

As the line up features more than 40 different artists travelling from all over Europe, Primal uproar need your help to make sure everything takes place according to plan. Our festival is run on a fully D.I.Y basis. To make it happen we’re completely dependent on ticket sales and whatever help you can give this campaign. 

 

What Do We Need? 

 

To make sure this festival runs smoothly and provides a strong basis for a 3rd edition in 2018, we need to make sure none of the artists end up “paying to play” and that the promoters don’t put in huge amounts of work and end up making a major loss. These are always risks when organising D.I.Y. events these days, but there is still a demand for bold, original and “underground” events. The only way this can happen is with your help, which as well as helping this event, will help the health of the scene in general.

 

What Do You Get? 

 

We have carefully made a list of unique perks to give you different options for everyone’s pockets. We offer everything from hugs, dinners, tapes, vinyl and boutique live performances in Berlin, Hamburg or London.

 

Your contribution will be highly appreciated and will help in the making of our newly born industrial baby. The line up features a wide range of experimental, performance, noise and rhythmic music.

Taking place in the cavernous interior of the Stubnitz, these will be high impact and uncompromising demonstrations of today’s electronic avant-garde in action. 

 

 

The first edition of Primal Uproar happened in August 2016 and was a trial for what’s expected to be a long relationship with this impressive boat, bringing artists from all around Europe and cement our bonds with the cultural scene of the cosmopolitan city of Hamburg, Germany. For this 2nd edition, our plan is to be able to reward every artist and contributor in the way that they deserve. 

 

If you can’t contribute financially, there are other ways you can help by volunteering with us, so please get in touch to find out about the different ways in which you can help make this massive event happen. 

 

Please spread the word out there and more than ever “Make Some Noise” and use the Indiegogo share tools to let the world know about it.

 

Thank you for your contribution

story:
davidrowen/creative

Hello, I am David Rowen, an actor/musician and producer in New York City. A year ago, I launched my YouTube channel, davidrowen/creative, out of a love and necessity for musical artistry and collaboration. Devoting myself to being more intentionally creative has been absolute fun, and quite rewarding. I thank each of you for your continued support and viewership; I am encouraged by your kind words and enthusiasm for this work.

Following a successful crowdfunding campaign for “Joyful, Joyful” and TAPS Academy last year, I am back, launching a new campaign to fund an exciting, upcoming project!

the project

In 2011, I was commissioned by the American Heart Association (AHA) to arrange an a cappella medley of songs from Wicked, The Wiz, and The Wizard of Oz. The medley was performed by my college a cappella group, The Overtones, at two of the AHA’s annual galas. With the addition of the Overtones' year-end concert, the medley has only been performed three times. For years, I have dreamed about reviving this medley, and I am ready to make that happen.

the cast

I have assembled a stellar ensemble of singers – some of whom have sung the songs of this medley on Broadway and regional stages. Joining me will be Carly Amburn, Caroline Bowman (Wicked), Austin Colby (The Sound of Music), Jacob Dickey (Aladdin), Ali Hoxie, Nick Lehan, Bridget Linsenmeyer, Ines Nassara, Jake Odmark (Kinky Boots), Laurie Veldheer (Mamma Mia!), and Alan Wiggins (Beautiful: The Carole King Musical), with vocal percussion by Aaron Bayne of Towson Trills.

the why

We, the artists, that are associated with this project are professional actors and musicians who are actively striving to make a positive impact on society through our art. Whether we are providing happiness and laughter, causing tears and sorrow, or provoking thought and perspective, our work is motivated by what can be learned, felt, and influenced through it. Pursuing art as a profession is not an easy fight to win, but our desire to reach and affect society for good is a prime motivating factor. We recognize the value and importance theatre and music has brought into our lives, and we know that they are powerful mediums to help people think, learn, and grow. This project is a dedication and opportunity to grant thanks to our communities and supporters. To say thank you for the music, for the stories, and for the profound affect this art has had on our lives and those around us. We hope that you will join us, and share in the joy of art and its contributions to humanity.

In following this theme, the video is scheduled to be released on "Wicked Day." On October 30, 2003, Wicked opened on Broadway, and over the years since, that day has been dedicated to the relatable story of self-discovery of one who is different and often misunderstood. We hope to add to the celebration of one of the most beloved and prosperous shows in Broadway history.

One additional motivation for creating these music videos is the viewers and fans they reach. I never expected to be so warmed and inspired by those who watch davidrowen/creative videos. Almost everyday, I receive comments from viewers all over the world who find solace, hope, and joy in this music. (I often have to translate messages written in foreign languages.)

"joyful, joyful" (sister act 2)

I watch this all the time when I need to hear inspirational words and voices. THANK YOU. This cover is a lifeline to me.﻿
 
PLEASE TAKE THIS AS A COMPLIMENT. As an Atheist, I LOVE this medley. Inspiration is where you find it and I find inspiration in the hopeful lyrics and the love behind them. This is a wonderful performance and I wish peace and prosperity to all of you. Thank you!﻿
 
I sent this to my entire faculty at school. Many of my co-workers have written emails to me saying that the video is "just what they needed." Congratulations! This is so on point and positive. #joyfuljoyful﻿
 

"let it go" (james bay)

I do not know the words but tears flowed I was deeply moved. With love from Japan
 

"waving through a window" (dear evan hansen)

I heard this on the Dear Evan Hansen mashup and I literally scoured YouTube until I could find it. You guys, gonna be real. Other than the original, this is the only version that genuinely gave me chills. Love this version, you guys should be really proud☺️

Absolutely beautiful! Thank you so much for sharing your gift!﻿

the campaign

In order to fulfill this plan, I need to raise a minimum of $13,000. The funds will go toward recording, mixing, mastering, video production, editing, photography, location rental, accommodations, craft services, insurance, and fees.

As the saying goes, "Every little bit counts," so every donation – no matter how big or small – is welcome, and greatly appreciated. Check out the perks on the right side of the page for a chance to be involved along the way!

the tax-deduction

This time around, I am pleased to offer a tax deduction for your donation. This option is particularly beneficial and incentivized for anyone interested in offering a sizable contribution. To receive a tax deduction, donate on davidrowen/creative's Fractured Atlas page.

the end

Thank you for your time, and thank you for your gift. Stay tuned!

story:
Short Summary

Hi there! I am Jamie McDermid, i have been running NHC MUSIC now for over five years, I am passionate about helping as many creative people as possible find the means to self funding, this will enable them to keep doing the fantastic work that they do!

NHC MUSIC is volunteer run, by creatives such as those we strive to help, but since we started to grow, the bills started to grow too, meaning we needed more and more ways to raise the funds to keep doing the work we do. Usually we raised funds by running our own charity music nights three times a year, unfortunatly though, with a high percentage of our own fans living outwith Glasgow, and a bit of a surge in charity music events throughout the city, these just weren't enough on their own to keep the doors open. You asked for other ways to support us instead, and this is one of the best ways you can do just that!

The money we raise here will go towards upgrading and replacing a lot of our equipment at NHC, our laptops are on their lest wee electronic legs, our amps have seen better days and are in dire need or repair (or replaced), and the shop itself really needs a bit of an overhaul, before it starts clattering down around our ears! We have been doing our best with volunteer donations over the past few years, and recently have been supplying all the painting and equipment ourselves, but it's not enough. If we want to keep our projects going without inturruption then we really do need your help. Every penny we make goes right back into the local music and arts scene and helps it, and those within it, prosper. Life would be pretty dire without music and art, so let's help it blossom together for another year!

What We Need & What You Get

We need our roof repaired on the inside of the shop from flood damage last year, we need new laptops as the ones we have at the moment have done us proud, but they are getting a wee bit more broken every day and truly are on their last legs, we need new shelving units fitted all over the shop, as the old ones are a bit wonky now and we really want to show off the works of the craftspeople and artists we distribute for in the shop in the best way we can! We also need a new solid front door, and a new sign at the front of the lane, as our door is one good kick away from being a swinging saloon door, and the signage at the street entrance was taken out by a rather large van a few months ago!

We don't want to just take and not give though, so we will offer you some cracking perks such as shop gift vouchers, limited edition 'I helped make the music and arts scene great again' T-shirts and badges, and even getting your name or that of your band painted onto the inside of our shop forevermore, that way you will truly be part of what we have created here, we will even make a wee video for you of the name getting painted on the wall within 48hours of the donation, and will then get it on the page and tag you into it! Every single penny we make during this once a year campaign will go towards some, or all, of the things we need, if we smash the goal then we get all our upgrades and repairs done, and the rest will just go right into helping new bands record and release new albums, or towards artists looking for some help with equipment themselves, nothing will go to waste. At NHC we feed the music, not the corporations!

The Impact

If this campaign is succesful, then the impact will be tremendous. We can only help others with their own goals if we have the proper equipment to do so, therefor by helping us, you are helping others to fulfill their own dreams. Creating music and art for everyone to love. A thriving music and arts scene means a healthier, and happier city too, so it's a win win for everyone!

Other Ways You Can Help

As always, we are not just about the money at NHC MUSIC - There are others ways you can help us too, like these things;

You could help us greatly by sharing this campaign across your social media pages, and also by telling folk abotu the great work we already do at NHC MUSIC!

You could pop in to the shop and chat about volunteering some of your time, rather than cash, to help us in our work. We always need mopre people at NHC!

You could donate some stock to us at the shop, we work entirelly as a not for profit so the stock that we sell to keep our doors open is all totally donated by the people we work with. We take anything, from books to records, from old cassette tapes to cd's, from old vhs tapes to pre-owned video games, and of course we always take in music equipment and instruments of any kind, even if it needs repaired. That way bands and musicians who cannot afford their own equipment can borrow ours from the shop, at no cost to them. Being skint should never be a barrier to creating music.

story:
Hi! I'm Cilla Bonnie, and I'm happy to invite you to help me make my debut EP 'Somehow' this winter at Chillhouse Studios in Charlestown, Massachusetts. 

 - Please take a moment to listen to the title track 'Somehow' just released on iTunes and Spotify to get a feel for the upcoming EP!

A little about me! - I'm from a small town in Maine originally, and moved to Boston ten years ago at age twenty to pursue music. Plugging myself into the music scene has felt very natural to me and being a female bass player has always felt relevant to the role I play in the music scene. Being  a bass player and backup singer in bands is what I feel known and respected for - but it's time for me to make a recording that really represents my solo project to kickstart my solo career!

About the EP - First of all, I hope you'll take a moment to listen to the title track/single 'Somehow' to get a glimpse at what the tone of this EP will be. I recorded this single in September with a stellar team of musicians, engineers and friends and am looking forward to getting in the studio with this great crew to record this winter. 

The music on this EP will be showcasing bass, vocals and groove. Melodic motifs and minimal production are important elements to me to create a musical storyline that feels intimate, personal and can shine in it's natural state.

The concept of this collection of songs is all about how we hold matters of the heart. Heartache and heart mend, the hot and the cold. How does an ending breathe a new beginning? And, what does it feel like to feel it? I really do feel like heartbreak is one of the most uniting experiences we can relate to.

Perks! - The perks that I'm offering for this campaign are all about the inspiration behind the music. The saying 'it takes a village' comes to mind when I think about what goes into writing, creating and recording music; from the flowers on my walk to work to falling in love with new music. With that said, perks that are up for grabs include:

  • selections of my poetry that I've extracted lyrics from
  • photographs I've taken of flowers that have inspired me
  • music and playlists I've hand selected to let you in on what I've been listening to and drawing musical inspiration from
  • photographs of me (from a photoshoot with the exquisite Ashley Clements)
  • original barebones pre-production demos
  • copies of my past recordings 'On the Bax' and 'With the Weather'
  • Posters, postcards and more!

What the Funds Will Cover - The funds raised by this campaign will cover:

  • All recording costs (pre-production, recording, mixing, mastering and production)
  • All musicians' compensation
  • All merchandise (cd's, distribution, posters, shipping costs and submission fees)

Why should you donate?

 The biggest reason I feel you should donate is simple - supporting  women in music.

I've observed women showing up more and more as musicians in the rhythm section. As these roles have been traditionally male dominated, I think music offers a great platform for the female voice. I'm honored and grateful to be a part of that.

I think the best way to support women in music is to support the music that women make.

 

So! Check out my single 'Somehow' - and if any part of you resonates with the music or the message or anything in between, I encourage you to donate and help make this EP happen!

Thank you SO much xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo
story_txt:
Hi! I'm Cilla Bonnie, and I'm happy to invite you to help me make my debut EP 'Somehow' this winter at Chillhouse Studios in Charlestown, Massachusetts.  - Please take a moment to listen to the title track 'Somehow' just released on iTunes and Spotify to get a feel for the upcoming EP!A little about me! - I'm from a small town in Maine originally, and moved to Boston ten years ago at age twenty to pursue music. Plugging myself into the music scene has felt very natural to me and being a female bass player has always felt relevant to the role I play in the music scene. Being  a bass player and backup singer in bands is what I feel known and respected for - but it's time for me to make a recording that really represents my solo project to kickstart my solo career!About the EP - First of all, I hope you'll take a moment to listen to the title track/single 'Somehow' to get a glimpse at what the tone of this EP will be. I recorded this single in September with a stellar team of musicians, engineers and friends and am looking forward to getting in the studio with this great crew to record this winter. The music on this EP will be showcasing bass, vocals and groove. Melodic motifs and minimal production are important elements to me to create a musical storyline that feels intimate, personal and can shine in it's natural state.The concept of this collection of songs is all about how we hold matters of the heart. Heartache and heart mend, the hot and the cold. How does an ending breathe a new beginning? And, what does it feel like to feel it? I really do feel like heartbreak is one of the most uniting experiences we can relate to.Perks! - The perks that I'm offering for this campaign are all about the inspiration behind the music. The saying 'it takes a village' comes to mind when I think about what goes into writing, creating and recording music; from the flowers on my walk to work to falling in love with new music. With that said, perks that are up for grabs include:
selections of my poetry that I've extracted lyrics from
photographs I've taken of flowers that have inspired me
music and playlists I've hand selected to let you in on what I've been listening to and drawing musical inspiration from
photographs of me (from a photoshoot with the exquisite Ashley Clements)
original barebones pre-production demos
copies of my past recordings 'On the Bax' and 'With the Weather'
Posters, postcards and more!
What the Funds Will Cover - The funds raised by this campaign will cover:
All recording costs (pre-production, recording, mixing, mastering and production)
All musicians' compensation
All merchandise (cd's, distribution, posters, shipping costs and submission fees)
Why should you donate? The biggest reason I feel you should donate is simple - supporting  women in music.I've observed women showing up more and more as musicians in the rhythm section. As these roles have been traditionally male dominated, I think music offers a great platform for the female voice. I'm honored and grateful to be a part of that.I think the best way to support women in music is to support the music that women make. So! Check out my single 'Somehow' - and if any part of you resonates with the music or the message or anything in between, I encourage you to donate and help make this EP happen!Thank you SO much xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo

story:
WHO ARE WE? NEREIDS? 

NEREIDS is a French metal band unique on the symphonic metal scene, hitting the stage since 2010. Unique? And why? The band combined with elegance the sound of chamber orchestra with the sounds of amplified instruments and have performed in some famous festivals such as PPM Fest in Belgium alongside Evergrey or Epica. The band's members Jérome (guitars), Antoine (lead guitars), Yann (bass), Manu (drums) and Camille (vocals) are willing for the best for the upcoming album. All the songs are already written and four of them have been performed live on the 17th of February in Miramas at l'Electrode. You didn't miss this show, right ? 

 

WHY DO WE NEED YOUR HELP? 

We would like to produce our album before the end of 2018. To do so, we need a certain amount of money : recording, mixing, mastering, printing the CDs, doing some promotion, etc... You might know that the process of creating an album have become really expensive. We need around 5500€. That's huge but we are truly convinced that thanks to your support we will succeed in gathering the right amount of money ! 

 

WHAT'S GONNA BE TOTALLY NEW? 

For the upcoming opus we are going to work with a full professional string orchestra. Goodbye samples, say hello to the real and powerful sound of highly talented classical musicians. This first step of recording took place in December in Grenoble (France)

You want to be actor of this "grande premiere" ? You can !

SO ! You wanna help us to produce what will be our most accomplished album ? 

If you want to be part of that wonderful project, it's up to you ! 

And we have a lot of rewards for you : from signed copies of our new album to become our guest for one day of recording or hanging out with us after a rehearsal, you will find something that will please you ! Just check it out ! 

Thank you for your support ! 

NEREIDS

story:
https://www.facebook.com/leaveeverythingandrun
https://leaveeverythingandrun.bandcamp.com/rele...
https://www.instagram.com/leave_everything_and_...
 

ENGLISH/GERMAN  +++++  ENGLISCH/DEUTSCH

 

Hi - we are ‚Leave Everything And Run‘ from Hannover, Germany. Thanks for visiting our funding page.

Lysann (vocals + bass)
Litty      (guitar + bass)
Michi    (guitar + bass)
Dom     (drums)

We have known each other for seven years and with this lineup and band name, making  music for the last 3 years.

The band name “Leave Everything And Run” symbolises an urgency which is also reflected in our music.
Anyone who wants to think in genres could say we play Alternative/Indie/Shoegaze/Noise. Ultimately, we have many musical influences. Either way we are autonomous, loud, emotional and psychedelic.

So far, we have always recorded demo tapes ourselves but now we’ve met a producer and a kindred spirit, he has a vision within our music. We now have the opportunity to get locked up with him in the studio of ‚Musikzentrum Hannover‘ for one week to create a beautiful album.

All appointments are confirmed and we will do the recordings from November 13th till November 20th, 2017. We will record and produce the album either way.

Aiming for studio recordings means we have to spend some money.
Please help us with this goal. With your support, we can recoup some of the costs incurred.

In any case, a big thank you to all our supporters!
Thanks for sharing in your social networks! Sharing is caring!
Be curious and look forward to the upcoming album!
It is going to be great!  

 

                                                           ++++++++++++++++++++++++

 

Hallo, wir sind LEAVE EVERYTHING AND RUN aus Hannover. Danke, dass ihr euch Zeit für unseren Aufruf nehmt.

Lysann  (Gesang + Bass)
Litty       (Gitarre + Bass)
Michi     (Gitarre + Bass)
Dom      (Schlagzeug)

Wir kennen uns seit sieben Jahren und machen seit 3 Jahren in dieser Konstellation unter diesem Namen zusammen Musik. 

Der Name LEAVE EVERYTHING AND RUN verkörpert eine Dringlichkeit, die sich auch in unserer Musik widerspiegelt. 
Wir sind eine Band, die den Genres Alternative/Independent/Shoegaze/Noise zugeordnet werden kann. Auf jeden Fall sind wir eigenständig, laut, emotional und psychedelisch. 

Bisher haben wir unsere Demo Tapes immer selbst aufgenommen.
Jetzt haben wir glücklicherweise einen Produzenten kennengelernt, der mit uns auf einer Wellenlänge ist, unsere musikalischen Visionen teilt und mit uns gemeinsam auf eine Reise gehen möchte. 

Im Musikzentrum Hannover haben wir die Möglichkeit uns mit ihm gemeinsam eine Woche lang ins Tonstudio einzusperren und ein schönes Album zu einzuspielen.

Alle Termine sind bestätigt, und wir werden in der Zeit vom 13. - 20. November 2017 unsere Aufnahmen starten. Aufgenommen und produziert wird das Album also in jedem Fall.

Ins Studio zu gehen bedeutet es auch finanzieren zu können.
Bitte helft uns dabei! Durch euren Support können wir einen Teil der anfallenden Kosten abdecken.

Auf jeden Fall jetzt schon ein großes Dankeschön an alle Supporter!
Danke fürs Teilen in euren sozialen Netzwerken!
Seid gespannt und freut euch mit uns auf das kommende Album! 
Es wird großartig!

story:
The Plan!

We are Retro Youth, an Alt Rock/RnB band based in North Wales in the United Kingdom.

http://www.facebook.com/RetroYouth

Since our launch in late March this year we've been all kinds of busy and have recorded and produced our first EP (Available on Spotify/Itunes) and two music videos for the tracks upon it!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yk600t6YKGY  (Lips As Leaders - Music Video)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gc6zVDljTFQ (You Won't Break - Music Video)

We've been slowly growing a great community of followers, have received some amazing feedback for the work we've produced thus far, have no cap on our aspirations (Which is where you guys come in! :D) have demo'd and finalised an albums worth of material and we've been offered a fantastic opportunity to record it  all with producer Lee Batiuk of Regal House Studios

http://www.RegalHouseStudio.co.uk

We're not gonna spin you a sob story here folks but we're not the richest of chaps and though we'll be working hard to raise the funds we need we just need that extra bit of help, 

Overheads! Cost Breakdown! Ruthless Efficiency!

To this end we need £5000... -gulp!- and the breakdown for these costs are as follows:

Production Costs, Recording, Mixing, Mastering - £4000

Travel & Accommodation - £300
 
IndieGoGo Fees - £450

Album Artwork & Physical Distribution - £250

Onboard so far!? Glad to hear it my good sir/lady!

We feel we really have an amazing opportunity here to produce something we'll be proud of and is relevant to current music and it's trends (With your help of course!) & we have a ton of exciting things in the pipeline which we've been working towards Though this a huge step for us it's just the first on our journey as a band! 
Even if you don't contribute in a monetary fashion, just give the link a good ol' share in your various social media and we'll call it a day squire!
Thank you again for taking the time to read this!

story:
Short Summary

Hey everyone!
Very pleased to announce that we are well on our way to recording our debut album, Formations. We are raising money to record, and get our music out to you!

What We Need & What You Get

Heeeere we go folks:

  • We need to raise $4500 to cover recording, mixing, mastering, CD printing, all the components that make up the task of making a record.
  • We will have CD's, downloads and more. Any money that is donated will garner a download of the album once it is available.

The Impact

  • We have been waiting for the right time over the last year to record this album, and the time is now.
  • Every dollar that you contribute will go towards making unique music that will be our joy to share, we need you to help in this!
  • We have been blessed with many musical friends, and namely, an amazing recording studio run by our good friend Joel Williams.
    Upper room records will give us the opportunity to  craft music that will be a pleasure to share.

    Help us help Joel pay his rent!

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Spread the campaign! If you like our music, even if you can't donate, every way that you can share about this project will be a blessing to us.
  • Facebook, twitter, email, conversations, you name it, the list is endless. Share the news!

story:
We have now signed with a publisher and the best promotion agent in Paris but ...

 

  •  We need 5000 Euros to complete our next video, pay for disc pressing and support a few major shows that we would like to produce in Paris.
  • I will personally autograph and leave each backer a personal note with the album as a sign of gratitude. 
  •  If we are short of 5000, we will use the money to fund the next video only. 

 

 Risques et défis

In music, there are no guarantees. But one thing is for sure, if the music is good, it will eventually find its audience. 

  •  There is something inbred in the American spirit, for better or for worse, that pushes to uncover our inner drive to accomplish what we dream of without waiting our turn. 
  • I've proven to myself and to others over these four years that there is always a way to acheive our dreams.

 D'autres façons d'aider

If you cannot monetarily contribute, please use other ways of supporting this project :

  •  Please speak to your friends about this project. The more we talk, the more they will listen. 
  • Remember to share the campaign on your social networks or by email

story:
Short Summary

Lou DeMarco

Born and raised in New York.  Of Italian and Russian descent.  Married for 44 years to the Lovely Linda DeMarco.

Write songs.  Lyrics and Melody.  Play instruments:  Guitar, Bass, Keys. 

I have been a working man and a business owner all of my adult life.

A few years ago, I was diagnosed with stage three cancer. I won that battle.  I am cancer-free.

My songs reflect my  point-of-view that We, The People, need to be treated FAIRLY, by those running the system and controlling  our lives.  

A huge believer in FREEDOM and CIVIC RESPONSIBILITY,  I am enjoying using my CREATIVITY to present these concepts in an Artistic Forum and  gain support for these IDEALS.

With your help, I will be able to pay for professional services and have RADIO READY MASTERS to present to the world.  

To be able to do this would mean the world to me and to my family, friends, and supporters. Would love for you to become one of Us, a Supporter and Fan of the L DeMarco Band.

 

What We Need and What You Get

Goal is $6,000.00+ to complete two songs.

Money will be utilized to hire Professionals and Secure the Use of Professional Facilities.  

~ Record Producer  ~ Recording Engineer  ~ Mastering Engineer  ~Administrative Staff

~ Photographer  ~  Videographer  ~ Stylist  ~ Hair/Makeup Artist  ~Graphic Designer

~ Commercial Recording Studio   ~ Photography Studio  ~ Mastering Lab  ~Equipment Locker

You will receive Perks      Always Free Shipping  ~~ Worldwide  @@

~Social Media "Shout Out" 

~Master Copies of the Songs  (Digital Download or CD)  

~Fan Club Membership   (Basic, Silver, Gold, Ultra, Lifetime)

~Merchandise:  Bumper Stickers, Posters, Coffe Mugs, Baseball Caps, T-Shirts

~Guitars:  A)  New Schecter w/case   B)  Classic Pre-owned by  L DeMarco ~ The Artist, w/case

~Flash Drives with your Favorite L DeMarco Band Lyric Videos and Mp3s

~Hand-Written and Signed Lyric Sheets

~Attend a Recording Session   

~Producer Credit on One or Both Songs

~Live Band Performance at Your Venue or Backyard                

The Impact

You help is VITAL to my success !! 

I am retired. So I took on some part-time work to fund my project.  I was able to record Professional Demos and to create the Lyric Videos you can hear and see now...here on my campaign page and more at my YouTube Channel.

~~ https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7MkTAVlPkTKoN... 

These tracks  and videos will give you a  good idea of what the songs could be.   With your help and financial support, I can take the next steps to create Radio Ready Masters.

Risks & Challenges

If I can stay healthy and alert, there are no real risks involved.  I am up for the challenge of working with professionals and relish the idea of being able to do so.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can, please use your email lists and social media pages to get the word out to your family and friends.  

For a small monthly fee, you can join my Fan Club.  

Join now and keep track of my progress at www.ldemarcoband.com.

Your support in any way that you are able to lend it, is so very helpful and so very much appreciated.  Well wishes are always welcomed !!

Thank you.

Power to the People  !!
